bot.name: Patherine
bot.description: Bot dedicated to celebrating Catherine de' Medici every day at 12:06

invite.description: Display an invitation link for the bot

help.description: Display information about the bot and its commands

embed.title: Patherine - Help
embed.description: Bot dedicated to celebrating Catherine de' Medici every day at 12:06

field1.name: Bot purpose
field1.value1: Pay tribute to **Catherine de' Medici** for popularizing pasta in France/Europe.
field1.value2: Every day at 12:06 in the dedicated channel, the bot checks messages containing `cath`.

field4.name: Leaderboards (leaderboard)
field4.value1: Ranking of users with the most caths (optional channel)
field4.value6: Ranking of days with the most cath messages

field5.name: Graphs (graph)
field5.value3: Maximum number of points to display (default=50)
field5.value6: Maximum number of points to display (default=50)

field6.name: Admin commands
field6.value2: Force update of all channels (OWNER only)
field6.value3: Fetch messages since this date (YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM UTC, max 10 days)
field6.value4: Add a channel to the database (ADMIN only)

field7.name: Support
field7.value1: For any suggestion or bug related to the bot, please open an issue on
field7.value2: You can also contact me directly on Discord: @Moutig or by email

untrack.description: Make the bot ignore all your messages

confirmView.explanation: Your messages and reactions will be **deleted**, and only your ID will be kept to ignore you

untrack.error1: You are already ignored by the bot.
untrack.error2: You do not appear in the database

success.part1: Your data has been successfully deleted

admin.description: Add a user as admin (only OWNER can do that)
admin.reject: You are not authorized to add admins
admin.success: has been added as an admin successfully

channel.description: Add a channel to the database (only ADMIN can do that)

arg.role: (Optional) Role to associate with this channel
arg.timezone: (Optional) Time zone to use when checking caths (default=Europe/Paris)

errors.alreadyExists: is already being tracked. Pls use

users.description: Show a graph of user participation over time

arg.total: Show total (cumulative) users instead of daily unique users
arg.points: Maximum number of points to display (between 10 and 200)

messages.description: Show a graph of messages sent over time

arg.total: Show total (cumulative) messages instead of daily counts
arg.points: Maximum number of points to display (between 10 and 200)

streaks.description: Show a graph of message streaks for top users
streaks.title: Best Streak Progression (Top 10 Users)

embed.title: Best Streak Progression
embed.desc: Top 10 users by max streak – progression of record streaks over time

errors.noData: Not enough data to generate the graph

delays.description: Best reaction times for success messages

arg.worst: Show worst delays instead of best ones
arg.avg: Show users' average delays instead of best ones

delays.title: Delays Leaderboard for
delays.error: You cannot use both 'worst' and 'avg' options at the same time

streaks.description: Top users by longest message streaks

arg.current: Show current streak instead of best streak

streaks.title: Streaks Leaderboard for

days.description: Top Participation Days – days with the most unique users sending a success message
days.title: Top Participation Days for

lb.error: is not registered. Use `/add channel` first

global.title: Global Statistics
global.description: Overall statistics for all tracked channels

me.title: My Statistics
me.description: Your personal statistics across all tracked channels

user.title: Stats for
user.description: Statistics for a specific user across all tracked channels

channel.description: Update a channel with the latest messages and reactions (only ADMIN can do that)

all.description: Update all channels with new messages and reactions (only OWNER can do that)

errors.notOwner: Only the bot owner can execute this command
errors.dateLimit: from_date cannot be more than 10 days ago

timezone.description: Update your timezone or create your user entry if missing
timezone.success: Your timezone has been updated to

arg.date: (Optional) fetch messages starting from this date (YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM UTC)

errors.date: Invalid date format. Please use YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM UTC

errors.notAuthorized: You are not authorized to perform this action
